Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'A failure! What a catastrophic failure!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Babylonia's reputation is dragged through the mud!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'All teams involved in this operation must be held responsible!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'I recommend those present in this meeting start considering a candidate for the judge of the upcoming court-martial.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'I hope you will provide a list of suitable candidates. I have some recommendations here as well.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Commander Nikola! You don't have to blame yourself.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: '(Notices that everyone is looking away) ...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "It's always a possibility for a military operation to go wrong.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "(Glances at other officers' expressions) ...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "The plan-makers don't always know the situation on the ground.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "A shame, that is! Even I don't know what's on the ground, haha!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Speaking of, I've almost forgotten the smell of fresh mud... That unique scent of soil mixed with decomposed, organic materials.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Then, President Hassen, this is a meeting for...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'A rescue operation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Our soldiers are still trapped in the Golden Vortex.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Our top priority is to get them out of there.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "The situation is critical on all fronts around the globe. Even with an emergency mobilization, we won't have enough troops for a rescue operation...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Those aren't ordinary soldiers in there. Maybe we should give them some time to... (shrugs) improvise.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "They're running out of time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Commander, you're better at mobilizing troops than me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I mean, all I do is bother you all, don't I?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Those in the meeting chuckle at Hassen's quip."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "(Stands up) I'll head to the Strategic Intelligence Unit to coordinate a rescue operation.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory64.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Enable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "How are you doing? I just received orders from the Strategic Intelligence Unit. We're deploying reconnaissance aircraft from Europe now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "They don't have enough firepower for air combat, so you must destroy the surface-to-air missiles first.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're climbing up the Golden Vortex from outside. It'll take us a while to reach the top.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Understood. The aircraft will match your timing for its arrival.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'It is all because of you!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: '(Screams) If it were not for you... the Golden Vortex would never have fallen!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nat rides on the back of her royal guard...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The rampaging royal guards approach you all from all directions...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'There are guards coming our way from the top of the building!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "(Blows up the wall) Get inside through the hole! We can't scale the wall from outside anymore...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory82.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Enable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We have to stop her royal guards...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'They are blowing up more openings and coming inside...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Karenina, how long until it's unlocked?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Stop talking and give me some time!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Will the security door to the top open once it's unlocked?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Yes. Theoretically.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Don't say you haven't been warned if guards rush in after I open the door.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'We wanted to climb up outside because guards are crawling everywhere inside, remember?', 4: '1'}
